topic.title: Abandoned Procedure Reason Observation - conformance rules

lines.i: An explanation of why efforts to conduct a procedure were abandoned

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.130"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11255)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10512)/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:10511)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10514), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ResusctitationDiscontinueReason 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.62 DYNAMIC (CONF:10513)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.16
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11255)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10512)/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:10511)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10514), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ResusctitationDiscontinueReason 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.62 DYNAMIC (CONF:10513)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.16
